title: Request a Copy of a Previous Tax Return
description: A citizen needs a copy of their state income tax return from two years ago.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely verifies the citizen's identity.

tasks.description: Locate the requested tax return in the archive.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully finds the tax return from the specified year.

tasks.description: Provide a digital copy of the tax return to the citizen through a secure portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes the document available for the citizen to download securely.
